biscuitValues.name: Grandma
biscuitValues.desc: A nice grandma to bake biscuits.

biscuitValues.name: Mine
biscuitValues.desc: Mines out biscuit dough and chocolate chips.

biscuitValues.name: Shipment
biscuitValues.desc: Brings in fresh biscuits from the biscuit planet.

biscuitValues.name: Portal
biscuitValues.desc: Opens a door to the Biscuitverse.

biscuitValues.name: Time Machine
biscuitValues.desc: Brings biscuits from the past, before they were even eaten.

biscuitValues.name: Elder Pledge
biscuitValues.desc: Puts an end to the Ancients' wrath, at least for a while.
